entry.title: Wildfire Aid 2023 concert benefit at Oakland City Park
entry.summary: OAKLAND — Oakland Community Theater is hosting Wildfire Aid 2023, a free wildfire relief benefit concert, on Sept. 30 at Oakland City Park. The event is in support of The American Red Cross' wildfire relief efforts.

entry.title: Jennings pretrial release in second-degree murder postponed
entry.summary: Sierra Sioux Jennings, 29, was scheduled to set trial dates and review a bail motion Wednesday. Due to charges of second-degree murder, the bail motion hearing was postponed for a full-day hearing tentatively scheduled for Oct. 18.

entry.title: Too wealthy for help, not wealthy enough for needs
entry.summary: Job growth is rebounding post-pandemic in nearly every Oregon county, but the portion of households in financial hardship remains stuck statewide at 44%, according to the most recent Oregon by the Numbers 2023 data released by the Ford Family Foundation.
